data.title: Need more seating area
data.text: I have found the burgers and fries to be very good and their breakfast is on par with Calico County only much less expensive. My complaint is that I have tried to stop there after church on two occasions and each time I was told that there would be a 30 minute wait to get a seat.  If they want more business they need to increase their seating capacity

data.title: Always on Point!
data.text: Small place with great food.  The Philly is my favorite. Not great for dining in with the family but the service is friendly. I would recommend calling in your order

data.title: Great food!
data.text: The nacho plate is huge and delicious and the Breakfest is great. Even better that stay open 24/7!! I had the eggs and ham Breakfest twice, both times it was fantastic!

data.title: Gotcha Breakfast
data.text: Need to try this, I am long time local and it is still a favorite!  Mom and I wait 20 mins to get a table and that is not a hardship to wait for this experience.  Food is fresh and made to order scattered and smothered.  My top two choices are the amburger steak with gravy/onions and the gotcha breakfast: layered biscuit, sausage, eggs, hash browns all covered in white gravy.

data.title: Great service
data.text: I came here back in March when I was visiting Ft. Smith and came by this restaurant and I was surprised. Service and the food quality was great. Staff friendly. Best burgers in town. Absolutely recommend. Will come again.

data.title: Super Delicious
data.text: After living in Fort Smith for 11 years, we actually remembered to try out this place. We always said "we need to try that place" every time we'd drive by. The cheeseburger and onion rings were really, really good! The kids had pancakes and eggs and cleaned their plates.

data.title: Breakfast for two
data.text:
I go back to Benson's again and again because the food is good.  All the wait staff is friendly and work together in a way that my coffee cup is always full.  Any dirty dishes disappear off the table with out even knowing someone was there. 
I always tip to cook!

data.title: Disappointed.
data.text: We've driven past Benson's for years and never thought of stopping. Then I noticed the TA reviews and decided to give it a try. Service was okay, not great. Food was okay, not great. We had Texas Stix appetizer...breaded pieces of jalapeño peppers. All we tasted was the breading. Mount Chillmanjaro (nifty name), an open faced hamburger with chili, cheese, onions, etc. was very big and filling but not very good. Tasted like canned chile. Need a meal that's filling? Okay. Want a good taste experience...not so much.

data.title: Great 24 hour diner.
data.text: Good food at a good price. The staff is always friendly. It's small and there's not a lot of space, but it's worth it. The food is excellent.  I usually sit at the bar.  I love the breakfast food. I love the hamburger steak and chicken strip dinners.  I love the chef salads.  I love the burgers, bacon,lettuce, tomato sandwich, crinkle cut fries and some of the other food.  Can order any food on the menu 24 hours a day.

data.title: Great breakfast, great price
data.text: Nice little diner, really friendly charming people that work there. Had the breakfast quesodillo with hash browns, it was more than plenty of food and might tasty. My waitress kept the coffee coming and had a  friendly bubbly personality for that early in the morning.

data.title: First Place in FS w/good food
data.text: I've lived in Fort Smith since March of 2015. I moved from Texas and am accustomed to delicious food. I moved to Fort Smith and discovered that the locals apparently don't have taste buds given their tastes in "good" restaurants like TGIFriday's and the such. I tried this place a few months after moving here and it was the first place in Fort Smith I found that had good food at a good price. The staff was friendly. It's small and there's not a lot of space, but it's worth it. The food is excellent. I love the hashbrowns!

data.title: Love this place
data.text: I just love this place. Great little greasy spoon. Can actually see the cook preparing all the meals, and I mean they are very good at it. Great service and food. There's not alot of seating but seems like always enough. The menu is very ample for the size of the place. Breakfast anytime of the day.They are also open 24 hours so great late night grub for you party animals! Lol

data.title: love stopping here!
data.text: This is by far my favorite place to stop and eat.  They've increased the parking so it's much easier to get around. The waitresses here are lovely.  The portions are big on most of the menu items and they keep several types of cheesecake on the menu.

data.title: Basic grill
data.text: It's a typical grill folks... If you like it fried, on a grill they have it I'm sure.  Must be local folks that wrote the great reviews.  We wanted pie and coffee.  They had one choice.  We left and ate at a place down the street.

data.title: Lats nite breakfast
data.text: Love love love Bensons!!! Service is usually fast and friendly. Sometimes the regulars can be a little loud and annoying but that doesn't take away from the food!  It's what you could make at home but don't want too! LOL

data.title: Great little breakfast find
data.text: Small mom and pop place, breakfast diner type menu. Everyone was friendly,  owners were working hard. Prices were very fair, our entire meal was only 14 bucks and we had huge portions. Food was good, homemade quality.  Military discount offered.  We'd definitely return.

data.title: Great breakfast
data.text: Reminds me of an old time diner with great breakfast food.  They serve lunch and dinner too.  They are open 24 hours.

data.title: One of the Really Important Restaurants in Fort Smith
data.text: A page from the past - but vibrant today.  Benson's keeps alive and happy the classic American diner that is enjoyed by an array of different clientele.  Have eaten there many times and never once heard anyone complain about their food.  Service is amazing!

data.title: surprisingly good
data.text: A large group of us went there and were surprised how good it is.  The burgers and fries are great, the burger bowls are too..as well as the salads.  Coffee was even really nice.  Will return.

data.title: Benson's Grill
data.text: Driving through town and saw a crowd at this place. Stopped in for lunch. An obvious favorite of locals, we were surprised and pleased at our meal.
